ObjectStates.Name: Quarter
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function dealPTT()
    local deck = nil
    for idx, object in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        if object.name =="Deck" then
            deck = object
        end
    end
    deck.randomize()
    deck.deal(7)    
end

    onClick="dealPTT"
    width="200"

deal
</button> -->

LuaScript:
BASE_URL = 'https://dabledop.herokuapp.com'
-- BASE_URL = ''

COIN_GUID = '3f8f80'
POT_GUID = '39c189'

MP3 = {
    hey="https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/201091962978304000/780196046750875687/heyafter.mp3",
    hey_delay="https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/201091962978304000/780195111639842896/heydelay.mp3",
    john1="https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/201091962978304000/780163786534682644/part1.mp3",
    john2="https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/201091962978304000/780163799188897802/part2.mp3"
}

ASSET_GUIDS = {
    White = {
        total = '72d080',
        bag = '01573b',
        pings = 'cd0305'
    },
    Pink = {
        total = 'e6db4c',
        bag = '9a3c83',
        pings = '9d0ca3'
    },
    Purple= {
        total = 'a09bec',
        bag = 'ce6096',
        pings = 'd0d45e'
    },
    Blue = {
        total = 'e269b8',
        bag = '0bc4e1',
        pings = '53ef73'
    },
    Green = {
        total = '09d12a',
        bag = 'd66c15',
        pings = '0d3a5e'
    },
    Yellow = {
        total = '4f90ae',
        bag = '42ea41',
        pings = '8d6829'
    },
    Orange = {
        total = '5c6a34',
        bag = 'a929e5',
        pings = '054c54'
    },
    Red = {
        total = '0e96ac',
        bag = '928439',
        pings = '1d2cd1'
    }
}


function loadPlayerAssets()
    -- init the player_assets table, used
    player_assets = {}
    for color, their_asset_guids in pairs(ASSET_GUIDS) do
        player_assets[color] = {}
        for asset, guid in pairs(their_asset_guids) do
            player_assets[color][asset] = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        end
    end
end

function onLoad()
    -- clear out the stupid default playlist
    MusicPlayer.setPlaylist({})
    -- load the most common objects from GUIDs
    loadPlayerAssets()

    pot = getObjectFromGUID(POT_GUID)
    pot_text = {
        getObjectFromGUID('8e0d31'),
        getObjectFromGUID('bd6e01'),
        getObjectFromGUID('0a85cf'),
        getObjectFromGUID('82117f')
    }
    -- this the button the dirty way, rather than using XML
    local button = getObjectFromGUID(COIN_GUID)
    button.createButton({
        function_owner=self,
        click_function = 'stack',
        position = {0, 0.1, 0},
        width = 900,
        height = 900,
        label = 'reset',
        font_size = 250
    })

    -- set up flashy winning chip array
    flashy = {}
    color_idx = 1
    all_colors = {}
    for color, assets in pairs(player_assets) do
        table.insert(all_colors, color)
    end
end

function onUpdate()
    renderFlashyObjects()
end

function onObjectEnterScriptingZone(zone, obj)
    handleScriptingZoneEvent(zone,obj)
end

function onObjectLeaveScriptingZone(zone, obj)
    handleScriptingZoneEvent(zone,obj)
end

function onPlayerChangeColor(color)
    hideUnusedColors()
    if color != 'Grey' then
        postPlayerAPI(color)
    end
end

function onObjectPeek(object, player_color)
    if object.name == 'Card' or object.name == 'Deck' then
        broadcastToAll(string.format('%s is looking at cards that are not his',Player[player_color].steam_name))
        broadcastToAll(string.format('%s is looking at cards that are not his',Player[player_color].steam_name))
        broadcastToAll(string.format('%s is looking at cards that are not his',Player[player_color].steam_name))
    end
end

function onObjectPickUp(player_color, picked_up_object)
    handleWinningChipPickup(player_color, picked_up_object)
    -- yell at players touch chips that aren't theirs
    if picked_up_object.getName() == 'chip' then
        if getColor(picked_up_object) != player_color then
            playSoundClip('hey')
            -- playSoundClip('hey_delay')
        end
    end
end

function playSoundClip(clip_name)
    parameters = {
        url=MP3[clip_name],
        title=clip_name
    }
    MusicPlayer.setCurrentAudioclip(parameters)
    MusicPlayer.play()
    -- Wait.time(function() MusicPlayer.play() end, 1)
end

function handleScriptingZoneEvent(zone, obj)
    -- only watch for chips entering and leaving the pot, ignore other objects and zones
    if zone.guid == pot.guid then
        if obj.getName() == 'chip' then
            Wait.time(function() update_pot_totals(obj) end, 0.5)
        end
    end
end

function setFlashyObjects(object_name)
    for idx, object in ipairs(getAllObjectsByName(object_name)) do
        table.insert(flashy, object)
    end
end

function renderFlashyObjects()
    if #flashy > 0 then
        for idx, object in ipairs(flashy) do
            object.setColorTint(all_colors[color_idx])
        end
        color_idx = color_idx + 1
        if color_idx > #all_colors then
            color_idx = 1
        end
    end
end

function getAllObjectsByName(object_name)
    local objects = {}
    for idx, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        if obj.getName() == object_name then
            table.insert(objects, obj)
        end
    end
    return objects
end

function handleWinningChipPickup(player_color, picked_up_object)
    this_object_name = picked_up_object.getName()
    if this_object_name == 'winning_chip' or this_object_name == 'winning_chip_high' or this_object_name == 'winning_chip_low' then
        -- stop flashing all of that name type once claimed by a color 
        --- if you don't do this it spits out errors when added to a bag
        flashy = {}
        for idx, chip in ipairs(getAllObjectsByName(this_object_name)) do
            chip.setColorTint(player_color)
            chip.setName('chip')
            playSoundClip('john2')
        end
        -- keep the others flashy though
        setFlashyObjects('winning_chip')
        setFlashyObjects('winning_chip_high')
        setFlashyObjects('winning_chip_low')
    end
end

function onObjectEnterContainer(container, obj)
    if container.name == 'Bag' then
        updatePlayerFunds(container)
    end
end

function onObjectLeaveContainer(container, obj)
    if container.name == 'Bag' then
        if obj.getName() == 'winning_chip' then
            obj.setName('chip')
        end
        obj.setColorTint(container.getColorTint())
        updatePlayerFunds(container)
    end
end

function format_currency(number_of_chips)
    return string.format("$%.2f", (number_of_chips * 0.25))
end

function getColor(obj)
    return obj.getColorTint():toString()
end

function update_pot_totals(chip)
    update_total_text()
    update_player_ping_text(chip)
end

function update_total_text()
    -- get the length of the chips in the pot array, convert to currency text
    local text = format_currency(#getPotChips())
    -- update the pot total text fields
    for idx, text_label in ipairs(pot_text) do
        text_label.setValue(text)
    end
end

function update_player_ping_text(trigger_chip)
    -- determine the color of the chip that triggered this function
    local trigger_chip_color = getColor(trigger_chip)

    -- count how many other chips are in the pot of this same color
    local count = 0
    for idx, chip in ipairs(getPotChips()) do
        if getColor(chip) == trigger_chip_color then
            count = count + 1
        end
    end

    -- format the string, update that colors contribution text
    local text = ' '
    if count > 0 then
        text = string.format('%d pings', count)
    end
    player_assets[trigger_chip_color].pings.setValue(text)
end

function getBagChipCount(bag)
    -- count the chips in the bag, ignore other objects
    local bag_count = 0
    for idx, object in ipairs(bag.getObjects()) do
        if object.name == "chip" then
            bag_count = bag_count + 1
        end
    end
    return bag_count
end

function updatePlayerFunds(bag, obj)
    -- get the total funds text object for this bag color and update the value
    player_color = getColor(bag)
    player_assets[player_color].total.setValue(format_currency(getBagChipCount(bag)))
    local data = {
        score=(getBagChipCount(bag)*0.25),
        color=player_color,
        steam_id=Player[player_color].steam_id
    }
    putScoreAPI(Player[player_color].steam_name, data)
end

function putScoreAPI(player, data)
    local url = string.format('%s/api/scores/%s', BASE_URL, player)
    log('yes')
    WebRequest.put(url, JSON.encode(data), function(a) log(JSON.encode_pretty(JSON.decode(a.text))) end)
end

function postPlayerAPI(color)
    data = {
        player=Player[color].steam_name
    }
    local url = string.format('%s/api/scores/', BASE_URL)
    WebRequest.post(url, data, function(a) log(JSON.encode_pretty(JSON.decode(a.text))) end)
end

function getPotChips()
    -- loop over all objects in the pot, return only the chip objects
    local chips = {}
    for idx, object in ipairs(pot.getObjects()) do
        if object.getName() == 'chip' or object.getName() == 'winning_chip' then
            table.insert(chips, object)
        end
    end
    return chips
end

function getActivePlayerColors()
    -- loop over all players in the game, return their colors
    local colors = {}
    for idx, player in pairs(Player.getPlayers()) do
        colors[player.color] = 1
    end
    return colors
end

function isActivePlayer(this_color)
    -- for a given color, returns whether or not a player is using that color
    local ret_val = false
    for player_color,_ in pairs(getActivePlayerColors()) do
        if player_color == this_color then
            ret_val = true
        end
    end
    return ret_val
end

function getColorsExceptThisOne(this_color)
    -- for a given color, return a table of all colors except this one
    local the_other_colors = {}
    for color,_ in pairs(player_assets) do
        if color != this_color then
            table.insert(the_other_colors, color)
        end
    end
    return the_other_colors
end

function hideUnusedColors()
    hideUnusedColorsText()
    hideOtherColorsBags()
end

function hideUnusedColorsText()
    -- hide text labels for each player color if they are not in use
    local active_colors_kv = getActivePlayerColors()
    for color, assets in pairs(player_assets) do
        if active_colors_kv[color] == nil then
            assets.total.setValue(' ')
            assets.pings.setValue(' ')
        end
    end
end

function hideOtherColorsBags()
    for color, assets in pairs(player_assets) do
        assets.bag.setInvisibleTo(getColorsExceptThisOne(color))
    end
end


function stack()
    local buffer = 1.25
    local total = 0
    local stack_num = 0
    local row_num = 0
    local x = -0.5
    local y = 1
    local z = 1
    local chipsPresent = false
    for _,o in ipairs(getPotChips()) do
        chipsPresent = true
        z = -z
        total = total + 1
        stack_num = stack_num + 1
        y = y + 0.5
        slowMove(o,{x,y,z})
        if stack_num >= 8 then
            stack_num = 0
            row_num = row_num + 1
            y = 1
            x = x + buffer
            if row_num >= 5 then
                row_num = 0
                x = -0.5
                z = z + buffer
            end
        end
        -- designate this a winning chip and make it flashy
        table.insert(flashy, o)
        ptt = true
        if ptt then
            o.setName('winning_chip_low')
            if z < 0 then
                o.setName('winning_chip_high')
            end
        else
            o.setName('winning_chip')
        end
    end
    if chipsPresent then
        playSoundClip('john1')
    end
    -- return all cards to the deck and shuffle it up
    shuffle()
end

function shuffle()
    -- rotate and reposition all cards or decks currently on the table 
    -- this will form decks by merging them
    for idx, object in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        if object.name == "Card" or object.name =="Deck" then
            object.setRotationSmooth({180,0,0}, false, true)
            Wait.time(function() object.setPositionSmooth({-3,2.5,0}, false, false) end, 2)
        end
    end
    -- wait and then put all hands into the newly formed deck
    -- Wait.time(function() returnHandCards() end, 3)
    Wait.time(function()
        -- discover the deck on the table
        local deck = nil
        for idx, object in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
            if object.name =="Deck" then
                deck = object
            end
        end
        -- for each card in any player's hands, move to the deck
        if deck then
            for color, assets in pairs(player_assets) do
                for idx, object in ipairs(Player[color].getHandObjects()) do
                    if object.name =="Card" then
                        deck.putObject(object)
                    end
                end
            end
        end
        -- once all cards have returned, shuffle it a few times
        Wait.time(function() deck.shuffle() end, 1.5)
        Wait.time(function() deck.shuffle() end, 1.75)
        Wait.time(function() deck.shuffle() end, 2)
        Wait.time(function() deck.shuffle() end, 2.25)
    end, 3)
    
end

function returnHandCards()
    -- discover the deck on the table
    local deck = nil
    for idx, object in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        if object.name =="Deck" then
            deck = object
        end
    end
    -- for each card in any player's hands, move to the deck
    if deck then
        for color, assets in pairs(player_assets) do
            for idx, object in ipairs(Player[color].getHandObjects()) do
                if object.name =="Card" then
                    deck.putObject(object)
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function slowMove(object, vector)
    -- re-orients object, waits, and then moves object
    object.setRotationSmooth({0,0,0}, false, true)
    Wait.time(function() object.setPositionSmooth(vector, false, true) end, 1)
    Wait.time(function() object.setPositionSmooth(vector, false, true) end, 3)
end

function calculateDrift(starting_amount)
    -- currently unused WIP
    print('=====\nplayer standings\n=====')
    local drift = {}
    for color, assets in pairs(player_assets) do
        if isActivePlayer(color) then
            player_funds = getBagChipCount(assets.bag) * 0.25
            standing = player_funds - 30
            player_name = Player[color].steam_name
            drift[player_name] = standing
            print(string.format('%s = $%.2f',player_name, standing))
        end
    end
    return drift
end
